CustomField.formula: IF(RecordTypeId = '0121B000001hgTt' && ISPICKVAL(MRR__c,"No"), (TPSummaryofAnnualizedProducts__c/12) + TPSummaryofNonAnnualizedProducts__c, IF(RecordTypeId = '0121B000001q5Wh' && ISPICKVAL(Service_Term__c, "1 Time Event"), Amount, IF(RecordTypeId = '0121B000001q5Wi' && ISPICKVAL(Service_Term__c, "1 Time Event"), Amount, Total_NRR_Formula__c)))
CustomField.label: Total NRR
